2023.title: CRISPR therapy wins global approval
2023.description: 2023 marked pivotal FDA and EMA approvals for CRISPR-based gene editing therapies, signaling the start of real-world gene editing in clinical practice.

2023.title: AI expands in biotech drug discovery
2023.description: AI algorithms increasingly powered genomic analysis and compound screening, with platforms like DeepMindâ€™s AlphaFold accelerating molecular research.

2023.title: Synthetic biology drives lab-grown meat scale-up
2023.description: Companies like Upside Foods and Eat Just advanced FDA clearance for cultivated meat, thanks to CRISPR and fermentation innovation.

2023.title: 3D bioprinting matures
2023.description: 3D-printed tissue and vascular scaffolds gained regulatory attention, with research expanding toward skin grafts and functional organ prototypes.

2023.title: Agri-biotech enhances crop resilience
2023.description: Gene-edited and drought-resistant crops were commercialized in 2023 to address food security and climate adaptation.
